ai-ja339:1.1_0: “You should see the snare of death,
ai-ja339:1.3_0: And wherever they had no use for that?
ai-ja339:2.1_0: And when the good friend, endowed with good conduct,
ai-ja339:2.4_0: you must stay in the forest.
ai-ja339:3.2_0: king of men, the lord of the earth,
ai-ja339:3.3_0: Then they offered him to the other side.
ai-ja339:3.4_0: there are many ascetics and brahmins.
ai-ja339:4.1_0: And when the good friend, endowed with good conduct,
ai-ja339:4.4_0: you must tell the ascetics of other religions.”
